A ceremony in southern Chinese city of July president she made a brief speech to formally open the twenty billion dollar mega project the thirty four mile bridge connects mainland China with the semi autonomous territories of Hong Kong and Rick how it's been in the works for almost nine years and has a key element of China's plan to connect the greater bay area of southern China
